Name: Humbly Enough
Desc: A spiced tofu dish. Saut√©ed tofu is stir-fried with the sauce until browned and ready to serve. Despite the ordinary ingredients, the resulting dish is particularly mellow and fragrant, a perfect partner for rice. It can be said to be the home cook's dish of choice.
Effect: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.
